TopicTitle: SHA mkH craft inspired by Sanka mkB

Articles.Content:
Hi, this is a small explorer and acrobatic airplane

Pitch autority is provided only by the front canards.

<iframe width="640" height="480" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen=""></iframe>

[DOWNLOAD](http://www./download/6o00ykc5hte4gua/SHA__mkH_By_Eorin.craft)
Neat! It looks a lot like a jet version of a Kyushu J7W Shinden.
a beautifully simple looking craft. very elegant and has such clean looking lines.
